summary:
Technical Design Lead, Lead Developer and DevOps Engineer with 16 years of experience in service-based organizations with hands on experience at varied roles and positions for multiple projects. 

Hands on experience in Microservices development, APIs, Spring Framework , AWS Cloud[ EC2, S3, API Gateway, RDS, SQS, CloudWatch, Lambda, ECS, SNS, CloudFormation, EKS], ELK (Elastic Search, Logstash, Kibana and Filebeat),  Java Technologies and DevOps and Tools.

Worked in different domains like Banking, Public Sector, Automobile Manufacturing, Web Portal, Insurance and Airlines. 

Played different roles throughout career like Technical Design Lead, Lead Developer, DevOps Engineer and Developer.

Software design and development experience in Distributed Agile Software Development Systems.
Worked onsite in US, UK, Canada, and Germany.

6 Years of design and architecture experience. 
8 years of experience in working with US clients. 8 years of experience in working with European clients i.e. UK and Germany.

Technical Design Leads for multimillion Customer Identity & Access Management (CIAM) project from the inception stage. Attended all workshops, vendor finalising meetings and architectural decision meetings.

Involved in a multimillion project from beginning, a monolithic application being replaced with micro services and APIs. Involved in designing and implementing several micro services. Responsible for deploying 50 micro services in production successfully and taking the application to Go-Live.  
Involved in containerization of Microservices with Docker and deploying to AWS ECS Fargate cluster. 
As a Lead Developer lead a team to create common technical components i.e. ELK Stack, SonarQube, Toggles, RabbitMQ, Icinga etc.
Delivered global session for DevOps- How to set up Elastic Stack in Distributed Systems.
Delivered global session for Java - Spring Batch Advanced – Advance topics on Spring Batch
Involved in development of several banking services for a leading German bank portal using APIs, Spring and Java technologies

profile_positions.description:
One of the solution architects for multi million Customer Identity & Access Management (CIAM) project – Attended all Workshops, Vendor presentations and vendor finalizing sessions.
Designed, developed, and deployed ELK stack in all environments in distributed systems and Elastic Search as a cluster.
Created technical designs and conducted multiple walkthrough sessions with OKTA and other architects. 
Designed and implemented POC for OAuth2.0 integration with OKTA
Involved in creating migration plan for migrating data in millions from on-premises LDAP to OKTA
Designed and implemented POC to deploy Spring Boot application in old JBOSS version by downgrading Spring Boot 2.x version to 1.5
Implemented Toggle framework for continuous build and deployment.
Designed and implemented automation tool to create a dashboard with details of Git versions and GoCD pipelines of latest deployments for Release Management. It  saved 4 hours of manual effort.
Identified the solutions for critical WorldPay integration issues and fixed them and modified the designs
Presented.
profile_positions.title: Technical Design Lead

profile_positions.description:
Involved in implementation of Microservices and APIs from a monolithic application for multimillion project.
Involved in implementing critical micro services developments like WorldPay integration, Direct Debit, and several other features. 
Responsible for deploying 50 micro services in production successfully and taking the application to Go-Live.
Deploying Microservices, Containerization with Docker and deploying to AWS cloud ECS cluster.
Used Terraform to create and deploy instances in AWS cloud.
Involved in domain creation and setting iF5Rules for the application with 50 Microservices
profile_positions.title: Lead Developer
